value.name: Report Details Killing Of Bombing Suspect’s Friend
value.description: The report released by State Attorney Jeff Ashton’s office in Orlando on Tuesday cleared the FBI agent of any criminal charges in the fatal shooting of 27-year-old Ibragim Todashev last May.
